text: Visited SPA for the first time and boss Jaime was very helpful and patient. He is very dedicated to the job and strive to give good customer service satisfaction. Got a bbxb and collected of CNY day 2! Now in my tank for the 1st day and very satisfied. Will definitely recommend all arowana hobbyist to visit!!

Sent my arowana for treatment. He was very knowledgeable & helpful, even explained to me in layman terms on what to do. Constantly updated on the condition of the fish. Overall impressed & highly recommend!!
Jaime is extremely honest and helpful on selecting my best looking arowana. Now back in my tank for 3 days with light on.

The whole experience was great. Jamie was friendly and patient. He would attend to your questions promptly. Impart his knowledge, advise and guidance to you. Looking forward to Ur after care and grooming services later. Thank you Jamie for Ur service and time. I appreciate it! üôèüèªüôèüèªüôèüèª

Mr Jaime is very friendly, honest and knowledgeable person. We got to know him through a fish supplies store personnel and we should say that it was one of our best decisions calling him to consult about our ailing arowana. He was very willing to share his vast knowledge on arowanas and we learnt so much from him. We could also see his confidence while doing an op on our fish. Our fish is doing much better now. Thank you Mr Jaime for your excellent service.
* Guys, pls don't hesitate to consult him for all your arowana related needs.
